verbs.description: A Democratic Party official in Texas [V: has] apologized after he cropped out First Lady Melania Trump from a photo in which she poses with former presidents and their wives at Barbara Bush ’s funeral .

[ARG0: A Democratic Party official in Texas] has [V: apologized] [ARGM-TMP: after he cropped out First Lady Melania Trump from a photo in which she poses with former presidents and their wives at Barbara Bush ’s funeral] .

A Democratic Party official in Texas has apologized after [ARG0: he] [V: cropped] out [ARG1: First Lady Melania Trump] [ARG2: from a photo in which she poses with former presidents and their wives at Barbara Bush ’s funeral] .

A Democratic Party official in Texas has apologized after he cropped out First Lady Melania Trump from [ARGM-LOC: a photo] [R-ARGM-LOC: in which] [ARG0: she] [V: poses] [ARG1: with former presidents and their wives] [ARGM-LOC: at Barbara Bush ’s funeral] .
